item.title: Saving
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

alright, i have a huge issue with Data loss when the server restarter reboots the server. Sometimes theres none but others there is lot. I have tried deveping a code to save all caracter files 10 seconds before the server restarts… but it only saves 10 seconds before if you was online when it robooted and never logged off. Here is the code i developed a lil… but how can i make it to start timing AS SOON AS the server boots up… not when a certain player log in??

	if (saveTimer > 0) {
            savechar();
            savemoreinfo();
	    saveTimer = 590;
	}

My server restarts after 10 minutes so thats why its 590 seconds…

Read full topic
